title: Is NCERT enough for plant physiology for the NEET and AIIMS? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)
All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: No. Understand concepts and few relatable topics from reference books but dont go too deep, just basics to make your ncert concepts stronger. Refer previous year questions,analyse the mindset of examiner and do conceptual mcqs from refrence books/coaching material "Something else too, can be better used to solve your doubts- Toppr Ask. Check it out now!"

No. Understand concepts and few relatable topics from reference books but dont go too deep, just basics to make your ncert concepts stronger. Refer previous year questions,analyse the mindset of examiner and do conceptual mcqs from refrence books/coaching material
